short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A dark theme called Magoon which is now available for the Chrome Developer Tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A theme that makes colors go pop üçæ, and makes everything look dazzlingly good! ‚ú®

You can find Magoon for other things such as Vscode, Rofi, React DevTools, and Alfred on Github: https://github.com/ntwigs/magoon

How to install
---------------------------------------------------------

- Install this theme.
- Go to the Chrome extension store page and install the extension.
- Open the Developer tools (CTRL + SHIFT + I, CMD + OPTION + I).
- Open the Developer tools settings (the cog in the upper right corner).
- Click on the Experiments tab.
- Check the Allow extensions to load custom stylesheets.
- Reload the Developer tools.

üíöThe Developer tools should now be magoonified! üíö

The theme was built with love ü•∞, black metal üé∏, and waaay to much spare time. üíö
